title: (x) Flipper, Flipper - faster than lightning! - hand drawn logo {Ryan}
content:
Anyone know the typeface used in this old Flipper illustration?  
It looks a bit like a bit of a cross between Clarendon and Cooper to me.

Dom

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Flipper le dauphin.jpg](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=Flipper%20le%20dauphin.jpg) | 16.47 KB |
author: Dominic Forde

comments.content: Hand-drawn. But good idea with the bastard child of Clarendon and Cooper..
